output.before:
[ONSCREEN TEXT] REVEAL WHO CORRUPTION SCANDAL

[VOICEOVER] For years, there have been whispers of corruption within the World Health Organization's African operations.

But now, new evidence has come to light that could shatter the image of the global health body as a beacon of trust and transparency.

Our team has uncovered a string of high-level corruption allegations against senior WHO officials in Africa, backed by internal documents and eyewitness accounts.

Despite these explosive revelations, the WHO has stonewalled requests for an independent investigation, insisting that its own internal probe is sufficient.

But even the whistleblowers who triggered that probe now say it is "whitewashed" and "lacks substance".

And that's not the end of it. Our investigation has also uncovered troubling links between the WHO and private companies with vested interests in the African health market.

One such company is the notoriously secretive Swiss drug giant Roche, which has a history of misconduct and questionable tactics in Africa.

In one report, leaked to us, a senior WHO official in Africa is accused of receiving gifts, cash and other favours from Roche.

Another alleged scandal revolves around the management of health supplies, with criticism levelled at the WHO's handling of drugs for meningitis and HPV vaccinations.

Our reporters have been met with silence and refusals from the WHO's top brass, who insist the allegations are unsubstantiated and politically motivated.

But we believe the evidence is clear: corruption is flourishing within the WHO, and it's time for the organisation to come clean and face the consequences.

Join us as we demand answers and hold the WHO accountable. Share this video and use the hashtag #WHOCorruption to add your voice to the call for transparency.

[ONSCREEN TEXT] View the full investigation at our website [WEBSITE].

[MUSIC ENDS]

[INTRO MUSIC FADES OUT]

[ANNOUNCEMENT] This investigative report was brought to you by [ORGANIZATION], working independently to expose the truth. Your support helps us to continue our work. Donate now at [DONATION LINK].

[OUTRO MUSIC FADES IN]

[ANNOUNCEMENT] [ORGANIZATION] - fighting for transparency and accountability. [ORGANIZATION NAME AND LOGO]

[OUTRO MUSIC FADES OUT]

But now, new evidence has come to light that could shatter the image of the global health body as a beacon of trust and transparency.

Our team has uncovered a string of high-level corruption allegations against senior WHO officials in Africa, backed by internal documents and eyewitness accounts.

Despite these explosive revelations, the WHO has stonewalled requests for an independent investigation, insisting that its own internal probe is sufficient.

But even the whistleblowers who triggered that probe now say it is "whitewashed" and "lacks substance".

And that's not the end of it. Our investigation has also uncovered troubling links between the WHO and private companies with vested interests in the African health market.

One such company is the notoriously secretive Swiss drug giant Roche, which has a history of misconduct and questionable tactics in Africa.

In one report, leaked to us, a senior WHO official in Africa is accused of receiving gifts, cash and other favours from Roche.

Another alleged scandal revolves around the management of health supplies, with criticism levelled at the WHO's handling of drugs for meningitis and HPV vaccinations.

Our reporters have been met with silence and refusals from the WHO's top brass, who insist the allegations are unsubstantiated and politically motivated.

But we believe the evidence is clear: corruption is flourishing within the WHO, and it's time for the organisation to come clean and face the consequences.

Join us as we demand answers and hold the WHO accountable. Share this video and use the hashtag #WHOCorruption to add your voice to the call for transparency.
